name: HaNoi To Bai Tu Long Junk 3 days/ 2 nights
description: HaNoi To Bai Tu Long Junk, Cruising with Bai Tu Long Junk, you will have a chance to visit Bai Tu Long Bay. Located east of Halong, it is one of very few areas, which have not yet been fully explored by the tourists. Highlight attraction in Bai Tu Long Bay is Vung Vieng floating village, a peaceful and typical fishing village. With various activities around, you can freely discover many interesting things not only from this village but also from surrounding area.
